comment: He is a great professor.  He works hard to make you the best artist you can be.  I certainly don't always agree with him, but I learn so much and he is usually always right. I value his opinion and would recommend him.  He is helpful, but you must ask questions for him to respond more to your work. Once you ask, he is GREAT!

I took him for 2D design.  He is the biggest jerk. Nothing is good enough for him and everything sucks.. He claims he's a real artist but he's nothing but a wannabe. Critiques "best to worst" (how awful is that?) He's ridiculous. I don't know what these other people are saying. He's leaving for SCAD thank god.
He was a great teacher.  Easy to understand.  Very helpful.  Plus he looks hot when he grows out his beard. what more could you want?

I had him for Drawing I.  He's kinda easy.  At first it was hard trying to understand him, but he's really nice.  He's very helpful when it comes to improving your drawing skills.  I learned a lot from him.

fascinating professor with a truly bizarre sense of aesthetics and humor. i found this class very rewarding . but you need to work to get the most out of it.  plus he is a real artist, shows a lot and makes genuinely strange and wonderful work. and am i the only one to notice that he has style to die for? highly recommended.
